thread.section_title: ScreenPrinting.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ScreenPrinting.com | screenprinting.com
thread.title: Hannah McKalips

author: Hannah McKalips
title: Hannah McKalips
text: Right after I sent in my order, they called me to ask about my order and let me know when they would be shipping it. They got the order out on Monday and it got to me by Tuesday, even though the expected arrival date was Wednesday. I'm really impressed with their helpfulness and the affordability and quality of their screenprinting screens.
